title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Photocell
description: A uCIFI photocell object is used for lighting control, particularly to identify when light should be switched ON/OFF.. objectID:'3419'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3419:1.1'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.1'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Photocell`.

ON lux level.description: Property. Lux level below which the photocell switches its relay ON or sends a switch ON message on the network.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'lx'.

OFF lux level.description: Property. Lux level above which the photocell switches its relay OFF or sends a switch OFF message on the network.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'lx'.

Photocell status.description: Property. Set to True if lux level is below ON lux level. Set to False if lux level is above OFF lux.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5518'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Fractional Timestamp.description: Property. Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).. resourceID:'6050'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.
